doc.title: 10th Penn'a Volunteers
doc.plot: "Taken during the land parade in honor of Admiral Dewey, just before the turn into 72nd street, with Grant's Tomb and decorated residences in the background. This entire series has a very high photographic quality, and the various organizations appear at their best."
